漏洞描述: An issue in the component RTKVHD64.sys of Realtek Semiconductor Corp Realtek(r) High Definition Audio Function Driver v6.0.9549.1 allows attackers to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code via sending crafted IOCTL requests.

An issue in the component rtkio64.sys of Realtek Semiconductor Corp Realtek lO Driver v1.008.0823.2017 allows attackers to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code via sending crafted IOCTL requests.
